name: VG_Customer_Order
query:
SELECT DATE(so.creation) AS Create_Date, so.name AS "Order_No:Link/VG_Customer_Order:100", concat("
image1
") as "Main_Image::100", so.order_type AS Order_Type, CASE WHEN aso.approve = "Approve" THEN 'Approve' WHEN aso.approve = "Check" THEN 'Check' WHEN aso.approve = "Cancel" THEN 'Cancel' WHEN aso.approve = "Sample Pending" THEN 'Sample Pending' ELSE 'Inprocess' END AS Approve, so.cust_name AS Cus_Name, so.contact_number AS Mobile_No, bm.branch_name AS Branch_name, im.item_name AS Item_Name, so.sales_person AS Salesman, so.delivery_date AS Delivery_Date, DATEDIFF(so.delivery_date, CURDATE()) AS Due_Days, aso.delivery_date AS Delivered_Date, CASE WHEN aso.delivery_date IS NOT NULL AND aso.delivery_date <> '' THEN 'Delivered' ELSE 'Pending' END AS Status FROM `tabVG_Customer_Order` so LEFT JOIN `tabVG_Approve_Order` aso ON aso.order_no = so.name LEFT JOIN `tabBranch_Master` bm ON bm.name = so.branch_name LEFT JOIN `tabItem_Master` im ON im.name = so.prod_name ORDER BY Due_Days ASC;
